name: Exor-Sister
description:
Exor-Sister is a parody of Cooking Mama style games made for Global Game Jam 2016.  Follow along with Sister as you perform an exorcism in 5 'simple' steps:

1) Cleanse the room. 

2) Draw a pentagram. 

3) Arrange the ceremonial candles. 

4) Keep the flies out of your eyes. 

5) And lastly, burn the possessed with holy water.

Credits:
